cells.text: The Company’s past operations included the manu-
cells.text_vi: Các hoạt động trong quá khứ của công ty bao gồm Manu-

cells.text: facture and sale of lead pigments and lead-based paints.

cells.text: The Company, along with other companies, is a defen-

cells.text: dant in a number of legal proceedings, including pur-
